patthana5.2:174.1: Bahiddhā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:186.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:191.1: Anidassanasappaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho abyākato ca anidassanaappaṭigho abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:196.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ abyākatañca anidassanasappaṭighaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:197.1: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekavīsa … pe … aññamaññe cha … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
